KASHER Aryeh, Jews and Hellenistic Cities in Eretz-Israel. Relations of the Jews in Eretz-Israel with the Hellenistic Cities during the Second Temple Period (332 BCE-70 CE). (Texte und Studien zum antiken Judentum. 21.)
